"T:Beach Wars 2018!":
"A sudden appearance of Darkers, ESC-A Darkers, as well as Oceanids in Wopal's coast area has been confirmed. There are also reports of Phantoms with a strong resemblance to Apostles from the Mother Cluster. The appearances are close to a relaxation area, and cannot be overlooked. All ARKS, head to the target location at once, and begin your investigation and suppression.
――――――――――――――――――――
Failure condition: Time limit expires"
"Beginning transfer now. Your task this time is to exterminate the enemies that have taken up residence on the beach."
"An enemy resembling Aratron has also been confirmed. Everyone please cooperate and proceed onward!"
"In addition, a mysterious signal has also been confirmed. Nasu and Naka...? I'm not sure. If you find out, please lend your help!"
